pages.text: All brewing recipes require a Rustic Bottle in the Rustic Bottle slot to begin the crafting process.
Grants the $(#cc0000)Bloodlust$() effect, increasing strength and healing a portion of the damage dealt.
Grants the $(#38761d)Spikeskin$() effect, increasing armor toughness and reflecting a portion of the received damage back to the attacker.
Grants the $(#6aa84f)Slimewalker$() effect negates fall damage. If you press the $(#6aa84f)sneak$() key, you will bounce upwards.
After consuming this brew, you will be teleported back to your assigned spawn point.
Grants the $(#9fc5e8)Siphon$() effect, increasing your mining speed and attracting items from a further distance.
Grants the $(#f1c232)Daybloom$() effect, increasing movement speed and regeneration during the day, however, exposure to dark areas will damage you.
Grants the $(#E0E0E0)Arachnid Grace$() effect, which allows you to move through cobwebs, climb walls vertically and be immune to poison.
